text: وكم ارسلنا من نبى فى الاولين

translations.translation: How many Prophets We sent to the previous peoples!
Many a prophet had We sent to the earlier communities,
How many a Prophet did We send to the earlier peoples!
How many Messengers did We send to the ancient people?
And how many Prophets We did send among the earlier people!
And how many a Prophet have We sent amongst the men of old.
And how many a prophet have We sent among the ancients.
How many a Prophet We sent among the ancients,
How many a prophet did We send among the men of old!
We have sent many a prophet to earlier peoples
And how many a prophet We sent among the ancients.
How many a prophet We have sent to the former peoples!
But how many were the prophets We sent amongst the peoples of old?
And how many a Prophet have We sent amongst the men of old.
How many a Prophet did We send to the ancients,
How many a prophet did We send to the ancients?
And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,
[43:6] And how many a prophet did We send among the ancients!

(How many a Prophet did We send) did We send before you, Muhammad, (among the men of old) among bygone nations; We knew that they would not believe, but We nonetheless did not leave them without messengers and Scriptures!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { وكم أرسلنا } أي: كثيراً أرسلنا قبلك { من نبيٍّ في الأولين } في الأمم الماضية
 فكذَّبوهم واستهزؤوا بهم
 { وما يأتيهم من نبيٍّ إلا كانوا به يستهزئون } 
 فاصبر كما صبروا
 ويحتمل أن يكون تقريراً لِمَا قبله لبيان أن إسراف الأمم السابقة لم يمنعه تعالى من إرسال الرسل إليهم
 وكونها تسلية للرسول صلى الله عليه وسلم أظهر
